Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate a device that allows people to communicate over a distance.
The student can show how the string telephone uses sound to transmit messages.
The student can label the parts of the telephone, demonstrating how it connects two people.
The student can depict the necessary materials used to create the string telephone.
The student can draw how this communication device is used in real life.
The student can illustrate how using a string telephone helps solve the problem of communicating over a distance.
The student can explain with drawings how the sound travels through the string.
